document_data.caption: A map showing Lundeth in northern Thindol.
document_data.name: Lundeth
document_data.mainbody: '''Lundeth''', also known as the '''City of Whirring Waters''', was a large city found in northern [[Thindol]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.Geography: Lundeth sat at the northern end of the [[Thingulph]] along the banks of the [[River Lundeth]] in the foothills of the [[Hazur Mountains]].
document_data.Activities: Lundeth was known for its wondrous machinery, some of which was capable of producing up to 100 [[sword]]s per day. Sadly the quality of items produced by the machinery was lacking, making weapons much more prone to breaking. Efforts were made continually to improve the process.
document_data.Inhabitants: As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, a small number of [[gold dwarf]] expatriates from [[Lantan]] and missionary priests of [[Gond]] settled in Lundeth.
